tree.note: Villanova product, perfect culture fit. Journeyed LAL→NOLA→POR→NYK. Heart & hustle player.

assetsGivenUp.name: Josh Hart (draft rights)
assetsGivenUp.note: Late 1st round gem from Villanova. Lakers developed him well.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2017 #30 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: LAL's own pick from mediocre 2016-17 season

assetsGivenUp.name: Cam Reddish
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Acquired from Hawks for Kevin Knox + protected 2022 1st
assetsGivenUp.note: Duke wing with upside, needed change of scenery from ATL

assetsGivenUp.name: Kevin Knox
assetsGivenUp.note: Kentucky forward, major bust. NYK reached for need over BPA.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2018 #9 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: NYK's own pick from poor 2017-18 season
assetsGivenUp.note: NYK went 29-53, bad enough for top-10 pick. Knox over better players.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2022 First-Round Pick (protected 1-18)

assetsGivenUp.note: Protection ensured pick wouldn't convey - NYK picked #11 in 2022, within 1-18 protection. Converted to 2023 2nd round pick.

assetsGivenUp.name: 2023 Second-Round Pick (conversion)
